name: MEC Outpost 25L Daypack - Unisex
description: Back and tougher than ever, the Outpost daypack protects your laptop and other essentials on rainy commutes and adventures further afield. Rugged, waterproof fabrics and water-resistant (but not waterproof) zippers keep the inside dry in mean weather, with air mesh straps and a ventilated back panel for a comfortable carry in all conditions. Burly webbing handles make strong attachment points and are handy when you need to grab and run.Fabric is rugged 840-denier nylon, coated with polyurethane for waterproofness and abrasion resistance.Lined in 200-denier PU-coated nylon for extra water-stoppage.All zip closures are YKK reversed coil, durable and water-resistant (but not waterproof).Shoulder straps are cushioning 8mm EVA foam wrapped in super-tough 1680-denier nylon.Adjustable sternum strap.Airmesh on the backpanel and inside shoulder straps allows air to circulate.Stretch mesh side pocket fits a water bottle.Zippered bucket style opening to the main compartment.Internal and external zippered mesh pockets for organization.Padded pocket holds a 15in. laptop and stops before the pack bottom to prevent fatal groundings.Strong 38mm webbing top handle and bartacked daisy chain at pack bottom can be lashed to vehicles and pack animals.
